channel.title: I really badly need a script that caps certain letters when I type them
channel.description:
I need a script for when like, I type the letter I, it capitolizes it. I dont care how it does it, just as long as it works, PLEASE!!!
KTHXBYE :)

thanx again :)[br][size=1]Posted at: September 19, 2006, 06:20:17 PM[/size][hr]nvm I fIgured It out myself. lol, oops I have It on stIll… Its really helpful. but keep trynIg to make It work when Its alone, that would be perfect.

item.source: I really badly need a script that caps certain letters when I type them

item.title: I really badly need a script that caps certain letters when I type them
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Alright, I managed to make one, and it works extremely fast, I tested it and it hasn’t missed an I yet, but, It capItIaIzes every I It sees. I’ll work on a way to only capitalize when its alone. But for now, try this.

Make sure you set the client to whatever program you’re typing in.

[code]program New;

procedure ConvToCaps;
begin
if isKeyDown(‘i’) then
begin
SendKeysSilent(Chr(8));
SendKeysSilent(‘I’);
end;
end;

begin
Repeat
ConvToCaps;
Until(IsFKeyDown(9));
end.[/code]

It shouldn’t be long until I put finish the finding the alone I part.

-Weibs.

Read full topic
